item.title: 20 Romantic Things To Do In Wine Country This Valentine's Day
item.description:
20 Romantic Things To Do In Wine Country This Valentine's Day

There will be plenty of love in the Wine Country air this Valentine's Day as couples celebrate not just the most romantic day of the year but a three-day weekend thanks to President's Day. We've rounded up 20 romantic things to do in Wine Country-10 in the Napa Valley and 10 in Sonoma County-so you can get started on your Feb.

item.title: Grand theft wine strikes Sonoma Safeway
item.description:
Grand theft wine strikes Sonoma Safeway

On Jan. 7, while inventorying the wine shelves at the Sonoma Safeway, the stocking clerk noticed something strange: entire rows of certain expensive wines - the "top shelf" wines, with bottle prices around $80 and up - were empty. Duckhorn Cabernet Sauvignon... Groth Reserve Cab...

item.title: Napa Valley’s Robert Mondavi Winery Kicks Off 50th Anniversary Year
item.description:
Napa Valley’s Robert Mondavi Winery Kicks Off 50th Anniversary Year

OAKVILLE, Calif. When Robert Mondavi opened the doors to his eponymous winery in July, 1966, he was inspired by his belief that he could make world-class wines in the Napa Valley. Those dreams realized, Robert Mondavi Winery is today recognized around the world as one of the most iconic institutions in American wine and food.

item.title: Peju Province Winery buys Acacia Vineyard in the Napa Valley
item.description:
Peju Province Winery buys Acacia Vineyard in the Napa Valley

Peju Province Winery of Rutherford announced it has purchased the Acacia Vineyard and Winery facility in the Carneros wine region, the first expansion of the winery since it opened in 1983.

item.title: Grgich Hills Estate celebrates the 40th anniversary of the Judgment of Paris
item.description:
Grgich Hills Estate celebrates the 40th anniversary of the Judgment of Paris

Feb. 8, 2016 /PRNewswire/ -- In 2016, Grgich Hills Estate will celebrate the 40 th anniversary of the historic Judgment of tasting and its legacy with Chardonnay with vintner dinners across the country, an appearance at the Smithsonian Institution and the long-awaited release of Miljenko "Mike" Grgich's autobiography "A Glass Full of Miracles" that tells the story of his fascinating life.
